sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: What is this?

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: We have the check stubs. From separate accounts…

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: Almost a thousand dollars, paid in different amounts…

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: To a Mr. James Reynolds way back in
Seventeen ninety-one

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Is that what you have? Are you done?

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: You are uniquely situated by virtue of your position—

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: Though 'virtue’ is not a word I’d apply to this situation—

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: To seek financial gain, to stray from your sacred mission—

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: And the evidence suggests you’ve engaged in speculation—

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: An immigrant embezzling our government funds—

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON
sp.l: I can almost see the headline, your career is done

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: I hope you saved some money for your daughter and sons

sp.speaker: BURR/JEFFERSON/MADISON
sp.l: Ya best g'wan run back where ya come from!

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Ha! You don’t even know what you’re asking me to confess

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: Confess

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: You have nothing. I don’t have to tell you anything at all
Unless

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: Unless

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: If I can prove that I never broke the law
Do you promise not to tell another soul what you saw?

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: No one else was in the room where it happened

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Is that a yes?

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: Um, yes

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: “Dear Sir, I hope this letter finds you in good health
And in a prosperous enough position to put wealth
In the pockets of people like me: down on their luck
You see, it was my wife who you decided to—”

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: Whaaaat—

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: She courted me
Escorted me to bed and when she had me in a corner
That’s when Reynolds extorted me
For a sordid fee
I paid him quarterly
I may have mortally wounded my prospects
But my papers are orderly!
As you can see I kept a record of every check in my checkered
History. Check it again against your list n’ see consistency
I never spent a cent that wasn’t mine
You sent the dogs after my scent, that’s fine
Yes, I have reasons for shame
But I have not committed treason and sullied my good name
As you can see I have done nothing to provoke legal action
Are my answers to your satisfaction?

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: My God

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: Gentlemen, let’s go

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: So?

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON AND MADISON
sp.l: The people won't know what we know

sp.speaker: HAMILTON
sp.l: Burr!
How do I know you won’t use this against me
The next time we go toe to toe?

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: Alexander, rumors only grow. And we both
Know what we know
